name: Mirror
summary: Put on your headset and test your sanity in Mirror. You’re transported into a surreal VR world controlled by the Creator, who wants to trap you for twisted experiments. Face physics-driven creatures, flickering lights, glowing materials, and unpredictable ragdolls in a chaotic, immersive environment. Explore strange mechanics, survive the Creator’s challenges, and confront the ultimate question: can you face the Mirror?
